links.title: Clients By Churn Status By Products

panels.content: ## Если у Вас что-то не работает или Вам не хватает функциональности, пожалуйста, [дайте нам знать](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/21421/).

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
toInt32(date) * 1000 as date,
SUM(tasks) as tasks
FROM (

    SELECT multiIf('$aggr_period' = 'day', toDateTime(toDate(task_time)), 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'week', toMonday(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),
                   '$aggr_period' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))), 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'year', toStartOfYear(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),
                   toDateTime(toDate(task_time))) AS date, 
         COUNT(*) as tasks
    FROM cloud_analytics.support_tasks
    WHERE
      has([$task_type], task_type)=1
      AND has([$response_time_group], response_time_group)=1
      AND has([$in_time_response], in_time_response)=1
    GROUP BY date
    ORDER BY date
)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
targets.rawQuery: SELECT  toInt32(date) * 1000 as date, SUM(tasks) as tasks FROM (      SELECT multiIf('week' = 'day', toDateTime(toDate(task_time)),                     'week' = 'week', toMonday(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                    'week' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                     'week' = 'year', toStartOfYear(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                    toDateTime(toDate(task_time))) AS date,           COUNT(*) as tasks     FROM cloud_analytics.support_tasks     WHERE       has(['question','incident','task','improvement','problem'], task_type)=1       AND has(['1-2 hour','less then 1 hour','3-4 hour','5-8 hour','9-24 hour','25+ hour'], response_time_group)=1       AND has(['in_time','out_of_time'], in_time_response)=1     GROUP BY date     ORDER BY date ) GROUP BY date ORDER BY date

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
toInt32(date) * 1000 as date,
groupArray((in_time_response, tasks) )
FROM (

    SELECT multiIf('$aggr_period' = 'day', toDateTime(toDate(task_time)), 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'week', toMonday(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),
                   '$aggr_period' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))), 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'year', toStartOfYear(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),
                   toDateTime(toDate(task_time))) AS date, 
          in_time_response,
         COUNT(*) as tasks
    FROM cloud_analytics.support_tasks
    WHERE
      has([$task_type], task_type)=1
      AND has([$response_time_group], response_time_group)=1
      AND has([$in_time_response], in_time_response)=1
    GROUP BY date,in_time_response
    ORDER BY date,in_time_response
)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
targets.rawQuery: SELECT  toInt32(date) * 1000 as date, groupArray((in_time_response, tasks) ) FROM (      SELECT multiIf('week' = 'day', toDateTime(toDate(task_time)),                     'week' = 'week', toMonday(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                    'week' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                     'week' = 'year', toStartOfYear(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                    toDateTime(toDate(task_time))) AS date,            in_time_response,          COUNT(*) as tasks     FROM cloud_analytics.support_tasks     WHERE       has(['question','incident','task','improvement','problem'], task_type)=1       AND has(['1-2 hour','less then 1 hour','3-4 hour','5-8 hour','9-24 hour','25+ hour'], response_time_group)=1       AND has(['in_time','out_of_time'], in_time_response)=1     GROUP BY date,in_time_response     ORDER BY date,in_time_response ) GROUP BY date ORDER BY date

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
toInt32(date) * 1000 as date,
groupArray((response_time_group, tasks) )
FROM (

    SELECT multiIf('$aggr_period' = 'day', toDateTime(toDate(task_time)), 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'week', toMonday(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),
                   '$aggr_period' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))), 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'year', toStartOfYear(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),
                   toDateTime(toDate(task_time))) AS date, 
          response_time_group,
         COUNT(*) as tasks
    FROM cloud_analytics.support_tasks
    WHERE
      has([$task_type], task_type)=1
      AND has([$response_time_group], response_time_group)=1
      AND has([$in_time_response], in_time_response)=1
    GROUP BY date,response_time_group
    ORDER BY date,response_time_group
)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
targets.rawQuery: SELECT  toInt32(date) * 1000 as date, groupArray((response_time_group, tasks) ) FROM (      SELECT multiIf('week' = 'day', toDateTime(toDate(task_time)),                     'week' = 'week', toMonday(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                    'week' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                     'week' = 'year', toStartOfYear(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                    toDateTime(toDate(task_time))) AS date,            response_time_group,          COUNT(*) as tasks     FROM cloud_analytics.support_tasks     WHERE       has(['question','incident','task','improvement','problem'], task_type)=1       AND has(['1-2 hour','less then 1 hour','3-4 hour','5-8 hour','9-24 hour','25+ hour'], response_time_group)=1       AND has(['in_time','out_of_time'], in_time_response)=1     GROUP BY date,response_time_group     ORDER BY date,response_time_group ) GROUP BY date ORDER BY date

panels.title: Support Tasks By Hours To Response

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
toInt32(date) * 1000 as date,
groupArray((task_type, tasks) )
FROM (

    SELECT multiIf('$aggr_period' = 'day', toDateTime(toDate(task_time)), 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'week', toMonday(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),
                   '$aggr_period' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))), 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'year', toStartOfYear(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),
                   toDateTime(toDate(task_time))) AS date, 
          task_type,
         COUNT(*) as tasks
    FROM cloud_analytics.support_tasks
    WHERE
      has([$task_type], task_type)=1
      AND has([$response_time_group], response_time_group)=1
      AND has([$in_time_response], in_time_response)=1
    GROUP BY date,task_type
    ORDER BY date,task_type
)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
targets.rawQuery: SELECT  toInt32(date) * 1000 as date, groupArray((task_type, tasks) ) FROM (      SELECT multiIf('week' = 'day', toDateTime(toDate(task_time)),                     'week' = 'week', toMonday(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                    'week' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                     'week' = 'year', toStartOfYear(toDateTime(toDate(task_time))),                    toDateTime(toDate(task_time))) AS date,            task_type,          COUNT(*) as tasks     FROM cloud_analytics.support_tasks     WHERE       has(['question','incident','task','improvement','problem'], task_type)=1       AND has(['1-2 hour','less then 1 hour','3-4 hour','5-8 hour','9-24 hour','25+ hour'], response_time_group)=1       AND has(['in_time','out_of_time'], in_time_response)=1     GROUP BY date,task_type     ORDER BY date,task_type ) GROUP BY date ORDER BY date

list.definition: SELECT metadata_modification_time FROM system.tables  WHERE name = 'support_tasks' AND database = 'cloud_analytics'
